data.title: Tyree Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Obituaries and announcements from Tyree Funeral Home, as published in Montgomery Herald
data.text:
Jerri Copley Obituary

n

Jerri McVey Copley, 90, of Oak Hill passed away peacefully on Wednesday, October 18, 2023 at CAMC Memorial Hospital Hospice Division.

Funeral service will be 2:00 PM on Monday, October 23, 2023 at Tyree Funeral Home in Oak Hill with Pastor Buddy Goins officiating. Burial will follow at Gethsemane Memorial Gardens in Oak Hill.

Visitation for friends will be...

Gloria L. Hager Obituary

n

Gloria L. Garten Hager, 82, of Oak Hill, passed away peacefully on Tuesday, October 3, 2023 at Beckley Appalachian Regional Hospital.

Born March 11, 1941 in Beckley, WV she was the daughter of the late Herman and Edith Arthur Garten.

Gloria retired from Sears, she enjoyed going to church, and in her leisure she enjoyed sewing and spending time with her...

Melanie Skeldon Obituary

n

Melanie Rae Doris Skeldon, 70, of Scarbro passed away on Sunday, September 24, 2023 at Plateau Medical Center in Oak Hill.

Born October 26, 1952 in Oak Hill, WV she was the daughter of the late Alexander "Bill" and Jean Bibb Doris.

Melanie worked for the Fayette County Board of Education as a hearing and speech therapist. She was a member of the First Brethren...

Scotty "Scott" Cafego Obituary

n

Scotty "Scott" Allen Cafego, 45, of Hico, passed away unexpectedly on August 28, 2023 at CAMC General Hospital, surrounded by his loving family.

Funeral service will be 4:00 PM on Thursday, September 7, 2023 at Tyree Funeral Home in Oak Hill with Pastor Michael Lanham officiating. Burial will follow at High Lawn Memorial Park in Oak Hill.

Visitation for...

John Alexander Obituary

n

John Addison Alexander, Jr. 76, of Oak Hill passed away peacefully with his family by his side on Wednesday, August 9, 2023 at the Bowers Hospice House in Beckley.

Born January 25, 1947 in Oak Hill, WV he was the son of the late John Addison and Sophia Lazarsky Alexander.

John was a proud 1964 graduate from Collins High School, was a member of the Tuesday,...

Patricia Sumner Obituary

N

Patricia Sumner was called to Glory on July 29, 2023. Patty started her life 85 years ago in Sanger, WV. She spent her youth on the small farm of her loving grandparents, John and Alice Rainey and uncles Thomas K. Rainey and Sheffie Ray Rainey. She often told stories of all the wonderful food that was raised on the farm and how much she loved the time spent...

Virginia Buskus Obituary

n

Virginia Lee Buskus, 89, of Oak Hill, passed away and received her wings on Tuesday, July 18, 2023 at Hilltop Nursing Center in Hilltop, WV. Funeral service will be 11:00 AM on Monday, July 24, 2023 at Tyree Funeral Home Chapel in Oak Hill with Pastor Bill Keeney officiating. Burial will follow at High Lawn Memorial Park in Oak Hill. Visitation for friends...

Cecil Harrah, Jr. Obituary

n

Cecil "Sonny" Edward Harrah, Jr., 70, of Mount Hope passed away peacefully on Thursday, July 20, 2023 at Raleigh General Hospital in Beckley. Funeral service will be 1:00 PM on Tuesday, July 25, 2023 at Tyree Funeral Home Chapel in Mount Hope. Burial will follow at Sunset Memorial Park in Beckley, WV. Levi McClung Obituary

n

Levi P. McClung, 90, of Beckley passed away peacefully on Sunday, July 16, 2023 at the Bowers Hospice House in Beckley. Funeral service will be 1:00 PM on Saturday, July 22, 2023 at Tyree Funeral Home Chapel in Oak Hill. Burial will follow at High Lawn Memorial Park in Oak Hill. Visitation for friends will be one hour prior to service at the funeral home....

Beverly Francesa Obituary

n

Beverly "Cookie" Thompson Francesa passed away June 12, 2023, at Plateau Medical Center in Oak Hill with her loving nephew, Gant Montgomery watching over her final moments.

Cookie was born in Oak Hill on November 13, 1943, to Dr. and Mrs. J.B. Thompson. She graduated from Collins High School in 1961 and went on to complete her education at East Carolina...

Gale Worlledge, Sr. Obituary

n

Gale "Pops" Worlledge, Sr., 81, of Lochgelly passed away peacefully on Wednesday, May 31, 2023, at Plateau Medical Center in Oak Hill.

Born September 24, 1941, in Nallen, WV, he was the son of the late Willie and Tressie Humphries Worlledge.

Gale was a 1961 graduate from Collins High School, a proud United States Navy Veteran where he worked as a Boiler...

Lee Tincher Obituary

n

Lee Ray Tincher, 77, of Fayetteville, passed away peacefully on Saturday, May 6, 2023, at Raleigh General Hospital in Beckley.

Born July 24, 1945, in Oak Hill, WV, he was the son of the late Ray R. and Jency J. Massie Tincher.

Lee was a proud United States Navy Veteran having proudly served aboard The USS Saratoga, he was an independent insurance agent since...

Charles Manning Obituary

N

Charles Robert Manning, 91, of Scarbro, passed away peacefully on Monday, May 1, 2023, at Raleigh General Hospital in Beckley, with his family by his side. Funeral service will be 1:00 PM Friday, May 5, 2023, at Tyree Funeral Home in Oak Hill with Pastor Jordan Legg officiating. Burial will follow at High Lawn Memorial Park in Oak Hill. Clarence Shirley Blake Obituary

n

Clarence Shirley Blake, 87, of Thurmond WV, passed away on Thursday, April 20th, 2023.

If love is measured by the stories they will tell, Shirley Blake was incredibly loved. Oh, the stories they will tell. Shirley was loved deeply and he loved others deeply.

Born April 18th, 1936 in Oak Hill WV, he was the son of the late Clarence "Pete" Gordon Blake and...

Eddie R Bowling, Jr. Obituary

Oak Hill

Eddie was born in Oak Hill, WV to Eddie R. Bowling, Sr. and Ethel Mae Callahan Bowling. He passed away unexpectedly at Ruby Memorial Hospital in Morgantown, WV, on April 19, 2023.

In addition to his parents he is preceded in death by two infant brothers; Teddy and James, and his precious daughter Carrie Beth Bowling.

Eddie was a Christian and a member of...

Clarence Kenneth Maynus, Sr. Obituary

Beckley

Clarence Kenneth Maynus, Sr., age 83, of Beckley, West Virginia, passed away peacefully on March 28, 2023. Born May 28, 1939, in Powellton, West Virginia, he was the son of the late Benjamin Maynus and Ada Maynus. Kenny worked for the Raleigh County Board of Education, as a coal miner, and occasional mechanical work. He had a green thumb; loved being outdoors...

?

Billy Ray Duncan, 77, of Mount Hope passed away on Sunday, March 26, 2023.

Born January 12, 1946, in Mount Hope, WV, he was the son of the late Clarence W. (Joe) Duncan and Mary Madeline Wees Duncan.

Freda Nickell Obituary

NDASH

Freda Bell Royal Nickell, 89, of Fayetteville, passed away peacefully on Saturday, March 18, 2023, at the Bowers Hospice House in Beckley, WV.

Born July 8, 1933, in Wilkesboro, NC, she was the daughter of the late Welsie and Dela Privets Royal.

Freda was a loyal and faithful member of the Mt. View Church of God and her greatest joy in life was being surrounded...

Madeline Williams Obituary

ndash

Madeline Yevonne Allen Williams, 82, of Maple Fork passed away peacefully on Thursday, March 16, 2023, at the Bowers Hospice House in Beckley, WV.

Born January 23, 1942, in Packs Branch, she was the daughter of the late Leslie and Elizabeth Allen.

She is preceded in death by brothers, Roger Allen and Frankie Allen; sisters, Dixie Williamson, and Wanda...

Jacob Andrew Hanson Obituary

NDASH

Jacob Andrew Hanson, 27 years old, who lived his life here on earth in a wheelchair, is now at home in Heaven, walking the streets of gold. Born September 22, 1995, to Amanda Davis, Oak Hill and Andrew Hanson, formerly of Fayetteville and now residing in Tomahawk, KY.

Jacob was a member of Calvary Baptist Church in Oak Hill and a 2014 graduate of Oak Hill...

Margie Cleo Blake Obituary

NDASH

Margie Cleo Blake, 92, of Oak Hill, WV, died on Sunday, February 19, 2023 at her daughter's house in Fairborn, Ohio.

Born January 4, 1931, at Mill Creek, WV, she was the daughter of the late Wiley Franklin Sullivan and Neva Johnson Sullivan.

Margie was a retired 2nd grade teacher with the Fayette County BOE with 25 years of service. She was a member of the Oak...

Marguerite Alice Nicely Obituary

Oak Hill

"Honor her for all that her hands have done, and let her works bring her praise at the city gate." Proverbs 31:31

Marguerite Alice Kelley Nicely was called home to the Kingdom of God on January 9, 2023, at the age of 90. She joined her husband Homer E. Nicely Sr., her youngest son, Doug Nicely, her parents and three brothers in Heavenly Grace. She was the...
